Description: Tiraz fragment woven in white silk; one selvedge preserved; decorated with a band embroidered in yellow, brown and blue silk, bearing a pseudo-Kufic inscription and stylised vegetal interlacing. Warp: silk, white, Z, 16/cm Weft: silk, white, Z, 14/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
